Hi Name,

You are registered for Write Like the Best Legal Writers* with Adjunct Writing Professor, David Kemp on Friday, February 3, 2023 at 11:00 a.m. PT. Review the agenda here and don’t forget to mark your calendar for this can’t-miss presentation!

Reminder: While all Justia Connect members are invited to attend the presentation, only Justia Connect Pro members are eligible to receive CLE credit. If you are not already a Pro, you can upgrade to Justia Connect Pro here.
*This presentation is approved for one hour of general MCLE credit in California.

Don’t miss our upcoming Justia Webinar presentation: Write Like the Best Legal Writers* At 11:00 am PT, Rutgers Law and UC Berkeley Law Adjunct Professor David Kemp will discuss how lawyers can improve their legal writing skills and why writing matters in the practice of law.

message: Name,

You are in the final hours to register for our next Justia Webinar, Write Like the Best Legal Writers* on February 3, 2023! Attendees will enhance their legal writing skills by exploring the craft of legal writing with Rutgers Law and UC Berkeley Law Adjunct Professor David Kemp.
bottomline: Act Now Before It Is Too Late!

message: Hi Name,

Just a few more hours until you join your fellow Justia Connect members and Adjunct Writing Professor, David Kemp for Write Like the Best Legal Writers.* We are looking forward to connecting with all of you!

The presentation will begin promptly at 11:00 a.m. PT. You should have received a unique Zoom link for this webinar. If you cannot locate your link, please contact Justia Support immediately for assistance.
Reminders:

All Justia Connect members are invited to attend the presentation, but only Justia Connect Pro members are eligible to receive CLE credit. If you are not already a Pro, you can upgrade to Justia Connect Pro here.

If you are a Justia Connect Pro seeking MCLE credit, your written materials are now available via the CLE center block in your Justia Connect dashboard. You must be present for the entirety of the webinar presentation. You must also complete attendance verification within 48 hours of the end time. A code will be given during the webinar.
*This presentation is approved for one hour of general MCLE credit in California.
Hi Name,

Thank you for joining us for our recent Justia Webinars presentation! You must complete your attendance verification to receive CLE Credit. As a reminder, if you have a free Justia Connect membership, you must upgrade to Justia Connect Pro to receive CLE credit.
The steps below must be completed by 12:00 p.m. PT on Sunday, February 5, 2023.
Completing Your Attendance Verification
list:
• Visit the Justia CLE Center: https://connect.justia.com/cle-center
  • Click on the “Complete Verification” button. 
  • Input the attendance verification code received during your presentation.
  • Follow the remaining prompts in the form to input all pertinent information and offer evaluation of the MCLE presentation.
  • Download your certificate, and you’re done!
message2: If you have any questions about verification, please contact Justia Support.
